Title: Relates to authorizing chief executives to designate any vehicle as an emergency vehicle during a state of emergency
Summary: Relates to authorizing chief executives to designate any vehicle as an emergency vehicle during a state of emergency.
LawCode: Amd ยง101, V & T L; amd ยง24, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law and the executive law, in relation to authorizing chief executives to designate any vehicle as an emergency vehicle during a declaration of a disaster emergency by executive action or local state of emergency
